title: a
text: individuals authorized to post or process information on publicly accessible systems are identified

title: b
text: procedures to ensure CUI is not posted or processed on publicly accessible systems are identified

title: c
text: a review process is in place prior to posting of any content to publicly accessible systems

title: d
text: content on publicly accessible systems is reviewed to ensure that it does not include CUI

title: e
text: mechanisms are in place to remove and address improper posting of CUI

title: a
text: security risks associated with organizational activities involving CUI are identified

title: b
text: policies, standards, and procedures related to the security of the system are identified

title: c
text: managers, systems administrators, and users of the system are made aware of the security risks associated with their activities

title: d
text: managers, systems administrators, and users of the system are made aware of the applicable policies, standards, and procedures related to the security of the system

title: a
text: information security-related duties, roles, and responsibilities are defined

title: b
text: information security-related duties, roles, and responsibilities are assigned to designated personnel

title: c
text: personnel are adequately trained to carry out their assigned information security-related duties, roles, and responsibilities

title: a
text: potential indicators associated with insider threats are identified

title: b
text: security awareness training on recognizing and reporting potential indicators of insider threat is provided to managers and employees
